thought: To craft a stone hoe, I need to craft 2 sticks. To craft a stick, I need to place 2 bamboo side by side in the crafting grid. I will move the bamboo from slot 27 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1
